text: allah (iruvarai) utaranam kurukiran; piritoruvanukku utamaikkappatta entap porulin mitum (atikara) urimai perata or atimai marroruvano, nam'mitamiruntu avanukku nalla unavu(m marrum) porulkalum kotuttirukkinrom; avanum avarriliruntu irakaciyamakavum pakirankamakavum (nam valiyil) celavu ceykiran. Ivviruvarum camamavara? Al'hamtu lillah (pukal ellam allahvukke) - enralum avarkalil perum palor (itanai) arintu kolvatillai
